Package mining

Class AssociationRuleMiner

  • java.lang.Object
    • mining.AssociationRuleMiner

  • public class AssociationRuleMiner
extends java.lang.Object

    Title: AssociationRuleMiner

    Description: Association rule miner.

    Copyright: Copyright (c) 2017

    Company: Dipartimento di Informatica, Università degli studi di Bari

    Class description: This class is used to mine association rules linked to a frequent pattern.

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Pier

      • AssociationRuleMiner

        public AssociationRuleMiner​()

    • Method Detail

      • confidentAssociationRuleDiscovery

        public static java.util.LinkedList<AssociationRule> confidentAssociationRuleDiscovery​(Data data,
                                                                                      FrequentPattern fp,
                                                                                      float minConf)
                                                                               throws OneLevelPatternException
        This method is used to find confident association rules linked to a frequent pattern.
        Parameters:
        data - Representation of the database table used for mine operations.
        fp - Frequent pattern used to find its association rules.
        minConf - Minimum confidence of the rule.
        Returns:
        List of association rules linked to frequent pattern whose confidence is equal or greater than "minConf".
        Throws:
        OneLevelPatternException - Throws OneLevelPatternException in case a frequent pattern has length of 1.

      • confidentAssociationRuleDiscovery

        private static AssociationRule confidentAssociationRuleDiscovery​(Data data,
                                                                 FrequentPattern fp,
                                                                 float minConf,
                                                                 int iCut)
        This method is used to generate the association rule itself.
        Parameters:
        data - Representation of the database table used for mine operations.
        fp - Frequent pattern used to find its association rules.
        minConf - Minimum confidence of the rule.
        iCut - Index used to split the frequent pattern in two parts, antecedent and consequent.
        Returns:
        New association rule generated by splitting the frequent pattern at "iCut" index.

      • computeConfidence

        private static float computeConfidence​(Data data,
                                       AssociationRule AR)
        This method is used to calculate association rule's confidence.
        Parameters:
        data - Representation of the database table used for mine operations.
        AR - Association rule used to calculate its confidence.
        Returns:
        Confidence of the rule.

      • computePatternTransactionNumber

        private static int computePatternTransactionNumber​(Data data,
                                                   FrequentPattern FP)
        This method is used to calculate the number of supporting pattern transactions.
        Parameters:
        data - Representation of the database table used for mine operations.
        FP - Frequent pattern used to calculate its number of supporting pattern transactions.
        Returns:
        Number of supporting pattern transactions.
